long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Bob on his stealthy adventures as he sneaks through buildings, disables security systems, and outsmarts guards to pull off the ultimate heists! In this thrilling puzzle game, you'll help Bob become the best robber in town by solving tricky puzzles, avoiding detection, and collecting treasures. With challenging levels and fun gameplay, every mission requires strategy and timing. Will you help Bob escape without getting caught? Play Bob the Robber now on Chrome Extensions and find out!
